sections.description: The best support ticket system for WooCommerce, fully integrated into the My Account page.
sections.changelog:
Version 3.0.7

  • FIX: Corrected a form wrapping and overflow error on the ticket view page.
  • ENHANCEMENT: Improved the user interface and design of the chat system for better readability.
  • ENHANCEMENT: Added the official plugin banner and icon for a more professional appearance in the repository.

Version 3.0.6

  • FIX: Corrected an issue that caused some emails to go to the spam folder.
  • FIX: Resolved a PHP warning on the ticket creation page.
  • ENHANCEMENT: Added client-side validation and a loading spinner for file uploads.
